cluster_description: Requirements for developer interfaces and system integration. Includes endpoint clarity, stability, and versioning.
Requirements supporting the development process such as documentation, test environments, and error tracking.
Requirements for the ALFREDO marketplace functionality, including searchability, app management, and developer submission flows.
Developer-oriented requirements that support creation of minimal, customizable, non-intrusive interfaces tailored to time-pressured users (e.g., nurses, caregivers).
